lore: Saint Celestine is a living embodiment of the Emperor’s might, and she radiates holy light. Beneath her the faithful are filled with courage, while heretics experience overwhelming terror. Flanked by her chosen Geminae champions, her gestures can heal the sick, or strike like the Emperor’s judgement itself to smite the foe with divine strength.

otherAbilities.name: Healing Tears:
otherAbilities.description: While this unit contains a Celestine model, in your Command phase , if this unit is below its Starting Strength , 1 destroyed model is returned to this unit.
otherAbilities.Lifewards:: While this unit contains one or more Geminae Superia models, Celestine has the Feel No Pain 4+ ability.

otherAbilities.name: Lifewards:
otherAbilities.description: While this unit contains one or more Geminae Superia models, Celestine has the Feel No Pain 4+ ability.

otherAbilities.name: Miraculous Intervention:
otherAbilities.description: The first time this unit’s Celestine model is destroyed , roll one D6 at the end of the phase. On a 2+, set that Celestine model back up on the battlefield, as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, with its full wounds remaining.
